title: Save Up to 3 Lives
description: One blood donation can save up to 3 lives. Your single decision can completely change someone's life.

title: Be a Real-Life Hero
description: Donating blood is not just an act. It's an opportunity to give someone a second chance at life.

title: Help During Emergencies
description: Assist in fulfilling urgent blood needs. Your donation could be someone's last hope.
